failed.text1: The authentication code expires in one hour.

successed.heading: Sended authentication code
successed.text1: You have received an email with an authentication code.
successed.text2: The authentication code is valid for one hour.
successed.text3: Please click the URL in the email to reset your password.

cautionNotMainSended.heading: If you do not receive the email
cautionNotMainSended.text2: If your email address is incorrect, please complete the account registration form again.

completeSignup.heading: Completed registration
completeSignup.text1: Your account has been successfully registered.
completeSignup.text2: Please try to login and enjoy comony.
completeSignup.text2Error: I'm sorry. Please try to register again

forcePwReset.heading: Password has expired
forcePwReset.text:
Your password has expired.
Please reset your password and log in again.

reminds.heading: Reset Password
reminds.leadtext1: We will send you an email to reissue your password.
reminds.leadtext2: Please enter the email address you have registered.

successed.heading: Email has been sent
successed.leadtext1: We have sent you an email to reset your password.
successed.leadtext2: Please re-register from the URL in the email you sent.

resetpw.completeText: The password reset for this email address has been completed.
resetpw.heading: Set your new password

temporary.text2: An authentication email has been sent to your registered email.
